description: Test audio samples for Whisper-IRON validation

samples.transcript_ground_truth: HE HOPED THERE WOULD BE STEW FOR DINNER TURNIPS AND CARROTS AND BRUISED POTATOES AND FAT MUTTON PIECES TO BE LADLED OUT IN THICK PEPPERED FLOUR FATTENED SAUCE
samples.transcript_whisper_tiny: He hoped there would be stew for dinner, turnips and carrots and bruised potatoes and fat mutton pieces to be ladled out in thick, peppered flour-fat and sauce.

samples.transcript_ground_truth: HE BEGAN A CONFUSED COMPLAINT AGAINST THE WIZARD WHO HAD VANISHED BEHIND THE CURTAIN ON THE LEFT
samples.transcript_whisper_tiny: He began a confused complaint against the wizard, who had vanished behind the curtain on the left.
